column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I don't actually "like" Cafe Ba-ba-reeba that much. It has good'ish food
column3: but there are better tapas bars in the city. Cafe Iberico is MUCH better
column5: and cheaper on all counts. Ba-ba-reeba is always crowded (as is Iberico)
column6: but at least Iberico is worth the wait! The one thing I'll give to Ba-ba-reeba is that they do take reservations (whereas Iberico doesn't)
column7: which earns them some major points for me.
